title: ICD-9-CM 2010 Hospital Edition, Coder's Choice Volumes 1, 2 & 3
features: Designed especially for hospital coders, hospital billers and insurance claim examiners. Includes ICD-9-CM Volumes 1 & 2 diagnosis codes and Volume 3 procedure codes in a single, compact, space-saving, thumb-indexed and color-coded book, with a comprehensive diagnosis coding tutorial and full-color anatomical charts.

>> Improve your diagnosis code accuracy with our color coding and symbol notation system >> Locate ICD-9-CM diagnosis codes faster with thumb indexing >>Book lays flat on your desk and stays open during use >>Anatomical illustrations help relate diagnosis codes to organ system >>Includes a comprehensive diagnosis coding tutorial >>Save valuable desk space with our compact 6" x 9" book
description: has written or edited over 200 books on medical coding, billing, reimbursement and practice management. He has been in the health care industry for over 40 years, working in clinics, hospitals, insurance companies, and has experience in providing patient care. His expertise in the medical coding field is the result of billing over $1 billion dollars in health insurance claims for physicians and other health care providers. He is the founder and President of Practice Management Information Corporation, dba PMIC, the nation's leading independent publisher of medical coding and compliance books, forms and software.

author: {'avatar': 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/81MFoQync4L._SY600_.jpg', 'name': 'James B. Davis', 'about': ['James B. Davis (Jim), known as "The Billion dollar Biller," has written or edited over 250 books on medical coding, billing, reimbursement and practice management. Jim has been in the health care industry for almost 50 years; working in clinics, hospitals, insurance companies, and also has experience in providing patient care. His expertise in the medical coding field is the result of billing over $1 billion dollars in health insurance claims for physicians and other health care providers while managing Professional Data Systems, one of the first online medical billing companies.', "He is the founder and President of Practice Management Information Corporation, dba PMIC, the nation's leading independent publisher of medical coding and compliance books, forms and software. He is also the CEO of Flash Code Solutions, LLC, a provider of sophisticated electronic coding and compliance solutions to the health care industry.", 'Jim designs, writes and edits books based on a deep first-hand knowledge of coding, billing, and reimbursement, as well as a clear understanding of how medical offices, clinics, hospitals, and insurance companies work and interact.']}
